txt.en: Defeat Kurr and collect his tooth
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Kurr has been seen by some tall rocks in the north-east plains of the Whitshaws, and it is believed that his tooth will be a valuable part of a collection of bounties.
'Well done, [placeholder]! This trophy will be a lively addition to my ever-growing collection.'

'Hail, [placeholder]! I hear you are quite the foe-hunter in these parts. Perhaps we can work together, eh?

'I am a collector of odds and ends -- trophies of the enemy. I believe that someday they will be of great historical value, you see.

'A troll named Kurr has been seen knocking about some large rocks in the Whitshaws. Will you bring me one of his teeth? I'll see that you are amply rewarded.'
Kurr romps in the north-eastern plains of the Whitshaws, hiding among some tall rocks near the fishermens' home.\n\nYou should summon and defeat Kurr, and collect his tooth.
Britric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have collected the tooth of Kurr, and should now return to Forlaw to collect your bounty.
